                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Season:  02
Episode: 09
Series#: 30

Aired:   May 23, 2010

Title: 	"Grady with a Chance of Sonny"
	
      When  Grady's  brother,  Grant,  makes  fun  of  him for not having a
      girlfriend,  Sonny  steps  in and pretends to be his girlfriend. They
      try  and  keep  the  act  going  when Grant visits and Sonny tries to
      squeeze  in a date with Tridark, star Blake Radisson. Meanwhile, Nico
      and  Tawni  pull a prank on Chad just before he gets ready to shoot a
      commercial for his self-titled energy bar.
